name: Snake Plant
description: Hardy plant that survives low light and irregular watering.

hotspots.title: Sword-Shaped Leaves
hotspots.content: Thick, upright leaves store water, making this plant drought-tolerant and perfect for forgetful waterers.

hotspots.title: Air Purifying
hotspots.content: Snake plants filter toxins like formaldehyde and benzene from the air, even at night.

hotspots.title: Shallow Roots
hotspots.content: Compact root system means it doesn't need frequent repotting and thrives in smaller pots.

name: Aloe Vera
description: Easy-care succulent that loves bright light.

hotspots.title: Healing Gel
hotspots.content: The gel inside the leaves can soothe burns, cuts, and skin irritations naturally.

hotspots.title: Water Storage
hotspots.content: Thick succulent leaves retain moisture, requiring infrequent watering - every 2-3 weeks.

hotspots.title: Sun Lover
hotspots.content: Thrives in bright, indirect light and can tolerate some direct sunlight.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: Decorative plant that needs attention and bright light.

hotspots.title: Large Fiddle Leaves
hotspots.content: Signature violin-shaped leaves can grow up to 12 inches long, making a bold statement.

hotspots.title: Light Sensitive
hotspots.content: Needs bright, indirect light and should be rotated regularly for even growth.

hotspots.title: Watering Needs
hotspots.content: Water when top 2 inches of soil are dry. Overwatering causes brown spots on leaves.

name: Calathea
description: High-maintenance plant that needs humidity and careful watering.

hotspots.title: Prayer Plant Movement
hotspots.content: Leaves fold up at night and open during the day - a fascinating natural rhythm.

hotspots.title: Pattern Varieties
hotspots.content: Stunning leaf patterns in combinations of green, pink, purple, and white make each plant unique.

hotspots.title: Humidity Lover
hotspots.content: Requires 50-60% humidity. Mist regularly or use a humidifier to prevent crispy leaf edges.

name: Pothos
description: Fast-growing vine that adapts to many light conditions.

hotspots.title: Trailing Vines
hotspots.content: Vines can grow 10+ feet long, perfect for hanging baskets or training along shelves.

hotspots.title: Air Purifier
hotspots.content: Removes indoor air pollutants like formaldehyde, xylene, and benzene.

hotspots.title: Easy Propagation
hotspots.content: Simply cut a stem and place in water - roots will grow in 1-2 weeks.

name: Spider Plant
description: Pet-safe plant that grows quickly and is easy to care for.

hotspots.title: Arching Leaves
hotspots.content: Long, graceful striped leaves arch outward creating a fountain-like appearance.

hotspots.title: Baby Spiderettes
hotspots.content: Produces mini plantlets (babies) on long stems that can be propagated easily.

hotspots.title: Pet Safe
hotspots.content: Non-toxic to cats and dogs, though pets may still be attracted to the dangling leaves.

name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: Popular decorative plant with large leaves and fast growth.

hotspots.title: Swiss Cheese Holes
hotspots.content: Iconic holes (fenestrations) develop as the plant matures, helping it withstand wind in nature.

hotspots.title: Aerial Roots
hotspots.content: Brown aerial roots absorb moisture from the air and help the plant climb in the wild.

hotspots.title: Fast Grower
hotspots.content: Can produce a new leaf every 4-6 weeks during growing season with proper care.

name: Peace Lily
description: Elegant plant that prefers low light and high humidity.

hotspots.title: White Blooms
hotspots.content: Elegant white spathes (not true flowers) bloom several times a year with proper care.

hotspots.title: Glossy Leaves
hotspots.content: Dark green, glossy leaves droop when thirsty - the plant tells you when it needs water.

hotspots.title: Low Light Tolerant
hotspots.content: One of the few flowering plants that thrives in shady spots with minimal natural light.

name: ZZ Plant
description: Extremely low-maintenance plant that thrives in low light.

hotspots.title: Waxy Leaves
hotspots.content: Glossy, waxy coating helps retain moisture and gives the plant its signature shine.

hotspots.title: Rhizome Roots
hotspots.content: Underground rhizomes store water, allowing the plant to survive weeks without watering.

hotspots.title: Drought Tolerant
hotspots.content: Nearly indestructible - can tolerate neglect, low light, and irregular watering.
